entries.dottrap_effect: A hidden trap explodes spraying a foul gas into the air!
entries.sys_disarm_trap: You carefully disarm and discard the trap.
entries.sys_traplay_count: You may only have 3 placed ranger traps at a time!
entries.clawtrap_struggle: The creature stuggles to free itself.
entries.sys_trapdrop_end: You have successfully deployed the trap!
entries.sys_trapdrop_middle: You continue to work on the trap...
entries.sys_trapdrop_start: You begin to set the trap.
entries.sys_trapdrop_wait_deploy: You must wait %DI second(s) before you can try to deploy this trap again.
entries.sys_traplay_cancel_attack: The combat distracts you from laying the trap!
entries.sys_trapdrop_too_close: You can't deploy a trap so close to a creature.
entries.sys_no_pets: That creature is not an enemy and cannot be trapped.
entries.trap_sonic_pulse_effect: The sonic pulse trap unleashes a piercing screech, stunning nearby enemies!
entries.trap_flash_bomb_effect: The flash bomb bursts, blinding nearby enemies!
entries.trap_webber_effect_no: %TT does not appear to be affected by the adhesive.
entries.trap_tranq_dart_effect_no: The tranquilizing poison has no evident effect on %TT.
entries.trap_noise_maker_effect_no: %TT is already too stunned to be affected by the noise maker.
entries.trap_spur_effect_no: The spur hits, but %TT ignores it in a blind rage!
entries.trap_drowsy_effect_no: The trap hits, but the poison has no effect on %TT.
entries.trap_drowsy_effect: The dart's poison takes effect on %TT!
entries.trap_no_skill_this: Your trapping skill is too low to use this trap.
entries.trap_no_skill: You do not have the skill to use traps.
entries.sys_cannot_throw: You cannot use a trap right now.
entries.trap_webber_effect: %TT has become entangled in the sticky mesh.
entries.trap_noise_maker_effect: %TT is stunned by the piercing noise!
entries.trap_spur_effect: %TT is blinded by the painful spur!
entries.trap_tranq_dart_effect: %TT slows noticeably as the tranquilizer takes effect.
entries.sys_creatures_only: The trap can only affect creatures!
entries.sys_miss: Your trap failed to affect the target.
entries.sys_not_ready: The trap is not ready to be used again.
